title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.6 - Conduct of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.6 - Conduct of hearing

State Regulations

The hospital arbitration committee shall not be bound by
common law or statutory rules of evidence or by technical or formal rules of
procedure, but may make such investigation or inquiry and conduct its hearings
in such manner as it deems proper and necessary in the
premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
327.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
